extendedInfo.description: Description:Sound Blaster Central gives you simplified support for product setup and usage with Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth devices that incorporate the multi-core SB-Axx1 audio chipset. It adds unprecedented audio controls and enhancements right from the palm of your hand!Key features include:Bluetooth Connectivity Tool- Easily manage and customize connections to Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth devices.Advanced Controls- Sound Blaster Central grants you mobile access to a full suite of advanced features that improves your music, movies, gaming and communication experience. E.g. Increase movie dialog levels for added clarity, or soften explosions so you wonât wake the family, removes ambient and acoustic noise for clearer communication, and much more!Customizable Alarm- Wake up to MP3 music or preset alarm tones with snooze function.- Set alarms to sound on your Android device, Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth device or both.Video Tutorials- Step-by-step videos teach you how to connect your smart device wirelessly to Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth devices.- Help you explore and take advantage of the many features of Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth devices.Requirements:- Devices with Android 2.2 or above- Devices with Bluetooth capability- Creative Sound Blaster Bluetooth devices- Devices with screen resolution of 480x320 or higherSupported devices:- Sound BlasterAxx SBX 10- Sound BlasterAxx SBX 20- Sound Blaster EVO Zx- Sound Blaster EVO ZxRNote: Some features mentioned are product specific, refer to its user manual for details.

reviews.title: Buggy, slow and memory hog
reviews.comment: Guess this needs a lot more work
reviews.author: chay sm

reviews.title: Bluetooth issue on galaxy tab 2 10.1
reviews.comment: It simply just doesn\'t connect via Bluetooth. I\'m connecting the speaker D200 to my tab 2 10.1 and it just doesn\'t show up. The app is okay but useless if i can\'t connect to my D200. I wonder if the app was designed for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Bluetooth functionality
reviews.comment: This app provides most of the functionality you would expect from any Bluetooth app but what I really liked about it is the ability to change the name of the bluetooth devices connected. This is really useful as i have 2 bluetooth headsets from the same brand and one bluetooth speaker. I can\'t comment on the additional audio settings as I do not own any sound blaster wireless speakers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Galaxy Ace. First thing i notice. It actually greets me when connected to my bluetooth speaker. The alarm can also sound from my bluetooth speaker.  Cool yet humane.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Connect to bluetooth speaker with easy. Good alarm clock with many options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goody
reviews.comment: Cool apps. Can connect to my bluetooth device at ease
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept,  doesn\'t go far enough.
reviews.comment: Need this app to work with the sound blaster wireless head phones. Only works to some larger, sound systems. I want to run the radio on my phone,  and bluetooth to the head phones.
reviews.author: Suzanne Henderson Marinelli

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This free app is really useful to manage your Bluetooth devices if you use them often!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Zii sound support
reviews.comment: Please make this app to support ziisound speaker such as adjust the speaker volume.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S lll
reviews.comment: Make great loud sound music boost! Awesome
reviews.author: Chelin Nguyen
